content.en: Coming soon:  The Association will introduce more Chinese film companies, professionals and productions to the Toronto International Film Festival (TIFF) 2020.
content.cn: 北美文化艺术交流协会将在2020多伦多电影节(TIFF)中向世界电影同行推介更多中国电影公司、电影人和电影作品，让我们拭目以待。

content.en: In 2019, the Association participated the Toronto International Film Festival (TIFF) and was the first exhibitor presenting Chinese film companies in the Festival and successfully hosted the first Chinese Film Exhibition. A total of dozens of Chinese film companies participated in the exhibition, made connections with many peers and discussed about future collaborations.
content.cn: 2019年，北美文化艺术交流协会与多伦多电影节(TIFF)合作，举办了首届中国电影展、行业论坛及晚会。数十家中国电影公司在协会的组织下集聚一堂，与来自世界各国业界同行进行深入交流，并共同探讨和展望未来的合作机会。

content.en: In 2018, the association partnered with TIFF and presented Chinese film productions in promotion meeting and industry forum.
content.cn: 2018年与多伦多电影节合作，举办中国电影推荐会及论坛。
